biocontainers.name: sdm
biocontainers.summary: sdm - simple demultiplex tool for FASTQ demultiplexing and dereplication

biotools.summary: Site Directed Mutator (SDM) is a web server for predicting effects of mutations on protein stability and function. Users input a wild type structure and the position and amino acid type of the mutation. An environment specific amino acid substitution frequency for homologous protein families is used to calculate a stability score.
